description: List GMS items that have been removed from TK Campaign by seller

common_parameters.name: partner_id
common_parameters.description: Partner ID assigned by Open API platform is required. Required for all requests.

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: UNIX timestamp, accurate to the second. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

common_parameters.name: access_token
common_parameters.description: The token for API calls. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours

common_parameters.name: sign
common_parameters.description: Signature authentication example: all request parameters sorted by name concatenated...

request_parameters.name: offset
request_parameters.description: Specifies the starting point, or the number of records to skip. Default is 0

request_parameters.name: limit
request_parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of records to return. Default is 50. Maximum is 500

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if no error. Empty if no error happened

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if no error. Empty if no error happened

response_parameters.name: warning
response_parameters.description: Indicate warning details if not warning. Empty if no warning happened

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_parameters.name: has_next_page
response_parameters.description: Indicate that there are more item IDs

error_codes.description: This shop is not whitelisted for Product GMS
Product GMS Campaign cannot be found

notes: The API documentation shows multiple URLs for different regions/environments (Global, Chinese, Short, etc). The error codes section shows various possible error scenarios that can occur during API usage.
